summary: The quirky story of Vera and Axl who both live in the same London warehouse but whose paths never cross until fate steps in.
cast: Déborah François|Fernando Tielve|Michiel Huisman|Iddo Goldberg|Richard Lintern|Katia Winter|Alexis Dos Santos|Lucy Tillett|Al Weaver|Leonardo Brzezicki|Sinead Dosset|Tim Plester|Florencia Braier|Yannis Tsitsovits|Johnny Lambe|Valentina Brazzini|Sotiris Panopoulos|Daniel Smith|Kate Forbes|Rosie Edwards|Sharon Young|Kai Milsted|Mufadzi Nkomo|Anders Berg|Heather Wright|Emily Joy 'Molly' Carroll|Lewis Jones|Joe Stretch|Joe Cross|Laura Marsden|Billie Marsden|Mike Bennet|Connan Tent Hosford|Lucy Hunter|James Milne|Martin Oscroft
title: Camas deshechas
